INSERT INTO basis_tb_order ( TRADE_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, SKU_ID, PROPERTIES_NAME, PRICE, `CHANGE`, POINTS, QUANTITY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) (SELECT #tradeId#, t.item_id, t.item_name, 0, '', t.price, 0, 0, 1, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# FROM basis_tb_item t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.item_id = #itemId# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.points, t.change, t.item_id AS itemId, t.sku_id AS skuId, CASE WHEN q.stock IS NULL THEN p.stock ELSE q.stock END AS stock FROM basis_tb_order t left join basis_tb_item p on t.item_id = p.item_id left join( SELECT qq.sku_id, qq.stock FROM basis_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state= 'U') q on t.sku_id = q.sku_id WHERE p.item_id is not null AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.trade_id = #tradeId#
